title: Smoky Chickpea Harissa Bowls
summary: Protein-rich chickpeas baked with harissa and served over lemony greens.
instructions: Toss chickpeas with harissa, olive oil, and smoked paprika and roast until crisp.
Dress spinach with lemon juice, zest, and a pinch of salt.
Serve chickpeas over greens with yogurt and almonds.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp Orzo
summary: One-pan buttery orzo loaded with garlic shrimp and lemon.
instructions: Sear shrimp with butter and garlic until pink; set aside.
Toast orzo, add broth, and simmer until tender.
Fold shrimp, parsley, and lemon zest into the orzo.

title: Miso Maple Salmon with Sesame Broccoli
summary: Sheet-pan salmon glazed with miso-maple sauce alongside sesame broccoli.
instructions: Whisk miso, maple, vinegar, and soy sauce to glaze salmon.
Roast broccoli tossed with sesame oil until tender-crisp.
Add salmon to tray, brush with glaze, and roast until flaky; garnish with seeds.

title: Spring Pea Risotto with Mint
summary: Creamy Arborio rice folded with peas, parmesan, and fresh mint.
instructions: Saut√© onion and rice in butter; ladle warm stock until creamy.
Fold in peas, parmesan, and mint right before serving.

title: Grilled Halloumi Tabbouleh Wraps
summary: Herby bulgur salad wrapped with charred halloumi and crisp vegetables.
instructions: Prepare tabbouleh with bulgur, parsley, mint, tomatoes, cucumbers, and lemon.
Grill sliced halloumi until golden and assemble inside warmed wraps with sauce.

title: Turmeric Coconut Lentil Soup
summary: Golden lentils simmered with coconut milk, turmeric, and ginger.
instructions: Bloom turmeric, ginger, and garlic; add lentils and broth and simmer until tender.
Finish with coconut milk and spinach; serve with lime.

title: Charred Corn Elote Pasta Salad
summary: Crew-cut pasta tossed with charred corn, cotija, cilantro, and lime crema.
instructions: Grill corn until charred, then shave kernels.
Whisk mayo, sour cream, lime, and chile powder; toss with pasta, corn, cotija, and cilantro.

title: Hoisan Glazed Tofu Lettuce Cups
summary: Crispy tofu tossed with hoisin sauce served in crunchy lettuce.
instructions: Crisp tofu cubes, then glaze with hoisin, soy, and ginger.
Spoon into lettuce with carrots and scallions.

title: Za'atar Roasted Chicken with Sumac Onions
summary: Sheet-pan chicken thighs roasted with za'atar and sweet onions.
instructions: Toss chicken with za'atar, lemon, and oil; roast with onion wedges.
Finish onions with sumac and serve with yogurt sauce.

title: Roasted Cauliflower Puttanesca
summary: Briny tomato sauce folded with roasted cauliflower and herbs over pasta.
instructions: Roast cauliflower florets until browned.
Simmer tomatoes with garlic, anchovies, capers, and olives; fold in cauliflower and toss with pasta.
